subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Arron Asham’s tie-breaking goal with 9 minutes 22 seconds left gave the visiting Devils a 5-4 victory against the Pittsburgh Penguins last night.
snippet: Arron Asham’s tie-breaking goal with 9 minutes 22 seconds left gave the visiting Devils a 5-4 victory against the Pittsburgh Penguins last night.
